metadata.name: Autumn inspiration
metadata.description:
Airdropped to collectors of ‚ÄúAwakening‚Äù which was linked to supporting my artist recidency in autumn of 2022.

This piece, created in the last 2 days of residency, became a symbol of my experience staying at the Cervo hotel in Zermatt, Switzerland. 
In the midst of the changing of seasons, not only were the surrounding nature exploding in autumn colors, the hotel had beautiful seasonal decorations everywhere. Dried flowers in amazing warm colors. 
By the end of my stay it became clear to me I had to photograph them so as to create this symbolism üçÇ
